text: Institut supérieur européen de gestion group (ISEG group) is a group of two French higher education schools (ISG Programme Business & Management, ISEG Marketing and Communication school) created in 1980.L’ISEG Group, d’une école à trois écoles.l'ISEG évolue et passe a la vitesse supérieure The group is in seven places, in Paris, Bordeaux, Nantes, Lille, Lyon, Strasbourg and Toulouse (France).« Semaine de l'entrepreneuriat» à l'ISEG Business School ISEG group delivers Bachelor's degree and Master's degree. ISEG group's main area is entrepreneurship.L'ISEG, Institut Supérieur Européen de Gestion, signe un partenariat avec l'Université de Rennes I ==Notable teachers and former teachers== * Fabrice Bardeche, Vice-President of IONIS Education GroupFabrice Bardèche, vice-président de Ionis Education Group (Esme-Sudria, Epita, Epitech, Ipsa, Iseg). ==References== Category:Schools in France Category:1980 establishments in France
title: Institut supérieur européen de gestion group
